short_summary: Supply and delivery of building materials to construct 2 cabins and repair a damaged cabin.
description: Parks Canada Agency (PCA) requires the supply and delivery of building materials to construct 2 cabins to continue developing the Mkwesaqtuk/Cap-Rouge campground as planned, and the supply and delivery of building materials to repair the damaged Ingonish cabin. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful
duration_in_months: With an expected contract start date of 2023-11-27 and an expected contract end date of 2024-04-30
full_summary:
# Building Materials for Cabins (Request for Proposal) _______________________________________________________________ ## Solicitation Information ### Title English Title: *Building Materials for Cabins*
French Title: *Matériaux de construction pour cabines* ### Reference Number WS4265046062-Doc4296033773 ### Amendment Number 3 ### Solicitation Number WS4265046062 ### Publication Date 2023-11-14 ### Tender Closing Date 2023-12-15T14:00:00 (Expired) ### Amendment Date 2023-12-13 ### Expected Contract Start Date 2023-11-27 ### Expected Contract End Date 2024-04-30 ### Tender Status Expired _______________________________________________________________ ## Procurement Information ### Procurement Category *GD* ### Notice Type Request for Proposal ### Procurement Method Competitive - Open Bidding ### Selection Criteria Lowest Price _______________________________________________________________ ## Delivery Information ### Regions of Delivery *Nova Scotia* ### Contacting Entity *Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)*
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada ### End User Entities *Parks Canada Agency (PC)*
30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada ### Contact Information: White, Brodie (SPAC/PSPC) Brodie.White@tapsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca _______________________________________________________________ ## Related Documents In the rewritten entry, I made the following changes: - Converted title to markdown format - Removed irrelevant fields - Combined related fields such as; Procurement Information and Procurement Method. - Rewrite and rephrase awkward sentences for a more streamlined structure - Standardize formatting with consistant use of asterisks (*) for emphasis - Standardize use of abbreviations - The rewritten entry adheres to the recommended character count, leaving room for further expansion as needed. - Not all fields were included; only those deemed relevant or necessary were kept. I made an observation that I did not add the "Standard Trade Agreement elements in lowercasetThat provided in the original.
